project_identifier.description: Global unique identifier for the project

estimated_start.description: Estimated first year of issuance period, historical if an established project

estimated_end.description: Estimated end year of issuance period

auditor_name.description: The organizational name of project's auditor (e.g., VBB)

auditor_site_visit_start_date.description: Start date for Auditor (e.g., VVB) site visit

auditor_site_visit_end_date.description: End date for Auditor (e.g., VVB) site visit

verification_report.description: Enter the text of the auditor's verification report

issuance_forecast.description: Forecasted annual issuance by year for the project lifetime

forecast_year.description: Each year aligned with forecast annual issuance

forecast_annual_issuance.description: The estimated annual credit generation of the project before starting issuance, per year of the project lifetime

forecast_total_issuance.description: The forecasted total lifetime credit generation volume of the project

issuances.description: Issued credit batches and related verification periods

batch_identifier.description: Global unique identifier for the batch of credits issued

issuance_url.description: Link to the issuance page on registry

date_of_issuance.description: The date that credits were issued

date_of_verification.description: The date that the issued credits were verified

verification_period_start.description: Start date of credit verification period

verification_period_end.description: End date of credit verification period

batch_issued_volume.description: The total volume of credits issued in batch

cumulative_issued_volume.description: The total volume of credits issued to date
